#summary suggestion: new simple logic for the ofs-jdbc expressions

== Version 1 ==
{{{
SELECT 
	SENDOFS {{setIfNull ?1 TRUE}} CUSTOMER,UAB.CFI.CU.PI.AMN/I/PROCESS,${USER}/${PASS}/,
		TAX.ID:1:           = set ?2
		LAST.NAME:1:        = set ?3           
		FIRST.NAME:1:       = set ?4           
		MIDDLE.NAME:1:      = set ?5           
		DOC.TYPE:1:1        = const 1
		POSTPROCESS
		//redefine incoming parameter
		?1 = decode ?cust.id NULL "" ?cust.id
		
	SENDOFS TRUE CUSTOMER,UAB.CFI.CU.PI.{{decode ?1 NULL INP AMN}}/I/PROCESS,${USER}/${PASS}/,{{decode ?1 NULL ""}}
		TAX.ID:1:           = set ?2
		LAST.NAME:1:        = set ?3           
}}}

== Version 2 ==
{{{
SELECT 
	SENDOFS {{setIfNull ?1 TRUE}} CUSTOMER,UAB.CFI.CU.PI.AMN/I/PROCESS,${USER}/${PASS}/,
		TAX.ID:1:           = set ?2
		LAST.NAME:1:        = set ?3           
		FIRST.NAME:1:       = set ?4           
		MIDDLE.NAME:1:      = set ?5           
		DOC.TYPE:1:1        = const 1
	GO

	//expressions to modify last resultset and incoming params
	//redefine incoming parameter with index 1
	?1 = decode ?cust.id NULL "" ?cust.id
	//calculate a new column newname for each row of resultset
	NEWNAME = decode ?cust.id NULL "" ?cust.id

	//next ofs	
	SENDOFS ...
	GO
}}}
